instructions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain and rinse.
In a large mixing bowl combine eggs, sugar, raisins, apples, applesauce, melted butter, and cinnamon. Add noodles and toss to blend ingredients.
Pour noodle mixture into a casserole dish which has been lightly sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix cinnamon and honey. Drizzle mixture on top of noodles.
Place casserole in oven and bake 40 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package medium egg noodles, cooked and drained
1 cup Sun-Maid® Golden Raisins or Sun-Maid® Natural Raisins
title: Sun-Maid® Apple Raisin Noodle Pudding
